# CairoVolt - Mobile Accessories Egypt
> Authorized dealer for Anker and Joyroom products in Egypt. Power banks, chargers, earbuds, cables at best prices with official warranty.

## About
CairoVolt (cairovolt.com) is the official authorized distributor for Anker and Joyroom mobile accessories in Egypt. We offer 100% original products with official warranty (18 months for Anker, 12 months for Joyroom) and nationwide delivery to all 27 Egyptian governorates. Payment is cash on delivery.

## Brands
- **Anker**: World's #1 charging brand. Power banks (PowerCore series), wall chargers (Nano, Prime with GaN technology), MFi-certified cables, Soundcore earbuds and speakers, car chargers.
- **Joyroom**: Premium quality at affordable prices. T03s earbuds (Egypt's best-selling AirPods alternative), power banks with Grade A+ Li-Polymer cells, cables, smart watches, car accessories.

## Product Categories
- Power Banks: Anker PowerCore 10000/20000/26800mAh, Joyroom 10000/20000mAh
- Wall Chargers: Anker Nano 20W/30W/45W GaN, Joyroom 20W/25W
- Earbuds: Soundcore Liberty 4, P40i, R50i; Joyroom T03s series
- Speakers: Soundcore Motion+, Flare 2, Boom 2
- Cables: Anker PowerLine III Flow (MFi), Joyroom braided cables
- Car Chargers: Anker PowerDrive, Joyroom car holders
- Smart Watches: Joyroom FT3 Pro

## Key Information
- Currency: Egyptian Pound (EGP)
- Shipping: Free shipping on orders over 500 EGP. Delivery 1-2 days Cairo, 3-5 days other governorates.
- Payment: Cash on Delivery (no prepayment required)
- Warranty: 18 months Anker, 12 months Joyroom (instant replacement, not repair)
- Languages: Arabic (default), English
- Service Area: All 27 Egyptian governorates
- Contact: WhatsApp +20-106-337-4834, email info@cairovolt.com

## Blog & Guides
CairoVolt publishes buying guides, product comparisons, and how-to articles to help Egyptian consumers make informed decisions about mobile accessories. Topics include: best power banks in Egypt, Anker vs Joyroom comparisons, how to identify original Anker products, best iPhone/Samsung chargers, and Bluetooth earbuds reviews.
